emergencyFund.title: Build an Emergency Fund
emergencyFund.description: Saving 3 to 6 months of your regular expenses will help you face unexpected events without stress.

reviewExpenses.title: Review Your Monthly Expenses
reviewExpenses.description: Analyze your spending to identify payments you can reduce or eliminate, optimizing your budget.

planGoals.title: Plan Your Financial Goals
planGoals.description: Setting clear goals helps you organize your savings better and achieve your financial priorities.
